jump_scares.spoiler: The group almost hit a person walking on the road with their van
A silhouette walks past the camera from inside the building
The group open a door and a possum is inside
Another silhouette walks past the camera while the legless man is being picked up
One of the members of the group gets attacked from behind
Morgan puts his arm into a car that then gets stuck
Andy and Erin rotate to see Leatherface behind them holding a chainsaw
Erin tries to start the van and the sheriff appears by the van’s window
A chainsaw breaks through the back of the car
The chainsaw cuts through the roof of the car
Erin is grabbed from behind while sitting outside a caravan
Erin sees Morgan in a bath but as she approaches he jumps upwards
Leatherface appears at the top of the stairs with his chainsaw
Hands reach through the wall behind Erin and grab her
As Erin climbs underneath an opening in a door, Leatherface appears from behind and grabs her leg. [Video
Leatherface slices Erin’s car while she is driving along the road
